participant_1.name: Julia
participant_1.personality: Julia is ambitious and has a flair for fashion, always seeking the latest trends in her shopping endeavors. She is determined and often finds herself dreaming big.
participant_1.background: i like shopping. i currently work for a watch dealer. i often shop for shoes and watches. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. my family does not support my career choices.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Michael is friendly and outgoing, with a great love for animals and a knack for enjoying simple pleasures in life. He is close with his family and enjoys sharing meals together.
participant_2.background: i love dogs. i live in alabama. i have three sisters. i like tacos.

content.text: Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?
